name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ep.list link on More Like This for Netflix

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a simple button, linked to the episode selection page for each "More Like This" videos on Netflix.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*After the installation, please refresh the tab or restart Chrome browser to enable this extension.
*This extension may be unavailable due to the future even little updates of Netflix homepage.
